channel.title: webpack on 打工人日记
channel.description: Recent content in webpack on 打工人日记

item.title: webpack学习
item.description: webpack学习 安装 //全局安装 npm install -g webpack npm install -g webpack-cli npm install --save lodash //安装到你的项目目录 npm install --save-dev webpack 创建package.json文件 npm init 创建目录结构 webpack-demo |- /dist |- index.html |- /src |- index.js |- package.json src/index.js function component() { var element = document.createElement('div'); // Lodash（目前通过一个 script 脚本引入）对于执行这一行是必需的 element.innerHTML = _.join(['Hello', 'webpack'], ' '); return element; } document.body.appendChild(component()); dist/index.html <!doctype html> <html> <head> <title>起步</title> <script src="https://unpkg.com/lodash@4.16.6"></script> </head> <body> <script src="./src/index.js"></script> </body> </html> package.
